name: IOBluetoothHandsFreeAudioGateway
desc: An object that sends data to a connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset and processes commands from it.

items.name: init!(device: IOBluetoothDevice!, delegate: Any!)
items.desc: Creates an object that controls a connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset.

items.name: func createIndicator(String!, min: Int32, max: Int32, currentValue: Int32)
items.desc: Sends a request to the Bluetooth device to show or update a status indicator.

items.name: func sendResponse(String!)
items.desc: Sends data followed by a success message to a connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset.

items.name: func sendResponse(String!, withOK: Bool)
items.desc: Sends data followed by an optional success message to a connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset.

items.name: func sendOKResponse()
items.desc: Sends a success message to a connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset.

items.name: func process(atCommand: String!)
items.desc: Processes a command from a connected Bluetooth hands-free phone or headset.
